keyword: how many calories in cinnamon bun
title: How Many Calories in a Cinnamon Bun?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in cinnamon bun, plus carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
h1: How Many Calories in a Cinnamon Bun?
assumptions: Standard bakery cinnamon bun with icing, baked, approximately 70g serving size.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical cinnamon bun has about 250 calories and 20g of sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cinnamon bun?
faqs.a: About 250 calories for a standard iced cinnamon bun.

faqs.q: Are cinnamon buns high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 40g of carbs per bun, mostly from dough and sugars.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a cinnamon bun?
faqs.a: Around 20g of sugars, primarily from the filling and icing.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in cinnamon buns?
faqs.a: About 10g total fat, including 5g saturated fat per bun.
A modest 4g of protein per bun, mainly from the dough.
